select o.*,buyer.user_name as buyerName,seller.user_name as sellerName,goods.goods_name from xiafish.`order` o left join xiafish.user buyer on o.buyer_id = buyer.user_id left join xiafish.user seller on o.seller_id = seller.user_id left join xiafish.goods on o.goods_id = goods.goods_id
